"Thank you very much, <%me>!":
"We are very grateful that you keep an
eye on planet Wopal, yet you also help
observed the seabed for us..."

"We thank you from the bottom of our
hearts for the precious experience that
you have brought us, <%me>."

"However, we feel that there will be
more desires coming soon. So please
help us again when the time has come!"

"<%me>さん
ありがとうございました！"

"惑星ウォパルを見ただけでも
充分に感激でしたが、その海底まで
観察できるなんて……"

"得難い経験をさせてもらって
心から感謝していますよ。
<%me>さん！"

"しかし、もっと欲が出て来そうです。
またよろしくお願いしますね！"
